articles.content:
The Pogues have paid tribute to their "great friend" and bandmate, bass player Darryl Hunt who has died age 72.
The punk group announced Hunt died on Monday afternoon in London, adding they were "sa… [+1965 chars]

articles.title: Ashton Kutcher confirms he is 'all good' and has 'fully recovered' from rare autoimmune disorder - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ashton Kutcher assured his fans Monday that he is 'All good' and has 'fully recovered' from a health scare he suffered years ago. He recently revealed on TV that he is 'lucky to be alive.'
articles.content:

articles.title: Lamont Dozier obituary - The Guardian
articles.description: Member of the trio who wrote and produced songs that built the Motown legend and helped define popular music in the 1960s
